wikipedia_page.main: Richard Cheslyn (17 December 1797 – 29 December 1858) was an English amateur cricketer who played first-class cricket from 1825 to 1846.  He was mainly associated with Sussex and Marylebone Cricket Club (MCC), of which he was a member.  He made 10 known appearances in first-class matches including one for Sussex in the second of the roundarm trial matches in 1827.

response: ** Richard Cheslyn, English amateur cricketer who played first-class cricket (1825-1846) (d. 1858)
